org.quartz.utils.counter

Interface Counter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SampledCounter, SampledRateCounter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CounterImpl, SampledCounterImpl, SampledRateCounterImpl

    public interface Counter
    A simple counter
    Since:
    1.8
    Author:
    Abhishek Sanoujam
